subject: Lacrosse
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Tom Crean, the new Indiana men’s coach, received the job security he wanted, signing a 10-year contract worth at least $23.6 million. The deal includes an annual base salary of $600,000 and additional payments for promotional work, school officials said.
